devdoc.author: Richard Meissner - @rmeissner

encodeMessageDataForSafe(address,bytes).details: Returns the pre-image of the message hash (see getMessageHashForSafe).

params.safe: Safe to which the message is targeted.

getMessageHash(bytes).details: Returns the hash of a message to be signed by owners.

getMessageHashForSafe(address,bytes).details: Returns hash of a message that can be signed by owners.

params.safe: Safe to which the message is targeted.

params._dataHash: Hash of the data signed on the behalf of address(msg.sender)

returns._0: Updated EIP1271 magic value if signature is valid, otherwise 0x0

simulate(address,bytes).details: Performs a delegatecall on a targetContract in the context of self. Internally reverts execution to avoid side effects (making it static). Catches revert and returns encoded result as bytes.Inspired by https://github.com/gnosis/util-contracts/blob/bb5fe5fb5df6d8400998094fb1b32a178a47c3a1/contracts/StorageAccessible.sol

params.calldataPayload: Calldata that should be sent to the target contract (encoded method name and arguments).
params.targetContract: Address of the contract containing the code to execute.

devdoc.title: Compatibility Fallback Handler - Provides compatibility between pre 1.3.0 and 1.3.0+ Safe Smart Account contracts.

isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).notice: Implementation of updated EIP-1271 signature validation method.

onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,u.notice: Handles ERC1155 Token batch callback. return Standardized onERC1155BatchReceived return value.

onERC1155Received(address,address,uint25.notice: Handles ERC1155 Token callback. return Standardized onERC1155Received return value.

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.notice: Handles ERC721 Token callback.  return Standardized onERC721Received return value.

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Implements ERC165 interface support for ERC1155TokenReceiver, ERC721TokenReceiver and IERC165.

tokensReceived(address,address,address,u.notice: Handles ERC777 Token callback. return nothing (not standardized)
